entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
